TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch, and Apache MXNet.

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

Tensors and Dynamic neural networks in Python with strong GPU
acceleration.

dependent_to.description:
This is a collection of packages that represents the official suite of
DOE/ECP proxy applications. This is a Spack bundle package that installs
the ECP proxy application suite.
dependent_to.name: ecp-proxy-apps

description:
miniGAN is a generative adversarial network code developed as part of
the Exascale Computing Project's (ECP) ExaLearn project at Sandia
National Laboratories.
name: minigan

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
